description:
Fuurin makes a phenomenal comeback and an upset, but then Yayoi has to face off against Oobi`s strongest batters!
Then, the final match between Daigo`s Fuurin Middle and Oobi Middle comes to a close.
After this intense finale, Daigo gets home, both physically and mentally drained.
Even though it seems that Daigo might not be able to keep going, a piece of paper on his desk changes everything.
It was a letter from his father, who had watched over their dramatic fight against Oobi Middle.
Source: crunchyroll
